mentions.context: The feature values have been calculated with the CountVectorizer and TfidfVectorizer functions provided by Scikitlearn.
We keep in this work only features with an occurrence greater than 2. The part-of-speech and lemmas are acquired thanks to the Marsatag platform [22], word dependencies with the spaCy library.
We keep in this work only features with an occurrence greater than 2. The part-of-speech and lemmas are acquired thanks to the Marsatag platform [22], word dependencies with the spaCy library.
